name: Slots Club
description:
Free coins, big wins, gorgeous reels, and exciting slots await you in the newest, freshest mobile slot app - Slots Club.
Spin the gorgeous reels to win millions of coins, open fantastic bonus rounds, win huge jackpots, and play with thousands of friends from all over the world.
It’s the slot machine adventure you’re craving, free to download and play everywhere you go!

Why you'll absolutely love our game:
• Free coins every day
• Rich bonus rounds
• Giant jackpot payouts
• Fast spinning reels
• Dozens of slot machines
• New slot machines added frequently
• 40 bet lines per slot machine
• Fun, exciting, beautiful themes
• Excellent prices for in-app coin purchases
• Awesome year-round coin sales
• Slot machines loaded with free spins & special prizes
• Collect & share achievements
• Send gifts to your friends
• Stay in the loop with all your friends in our super social Member’s Feed

What are you waiting for? Join thousands of players in the hottest new slots around. Download free and start winning now. Visit our website for more info: http://www.diwip.com.

Slots Club does not interfere with or manipulate the outcome of any of the spins or bonus rounds in and of the slot machines in any way. The end result for the player depends entirely on luck and the choices the player makes inside the game itself. Slots Club is not associated with, sponsored, or endorsed by Apple Inc.

Slots Club is intended for use by those 21 or older for amusement purposes only.

Practice or success at social casino gaming does not imply future success at real money gambling.

The games do not offer "real money gambling" or an opportunity to win real money or prizes.
